page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE ON SUNDAY
page.content: On a{Sunday morning}I am usually the first to wake so I go downstairs to see my pet rabbit.If the weather is fine I play with him in the garden. Later I wash and get dressed in my tracksuit which is a change from school uniform. When my sister Helen is ready we walk the short distance to have{swimming lessons}at the Crestwood school. Meanwhile my dad plays {football}for a local team. On a Sunday we have a big meal at lunchtime so we are at the table for about an hour.My favourite dinner is {roast beef}and{Yorkshire puddings.} In the afternoon I read or watch T.V. or my mom and dad might take Helen and me to Kinver Edge where we can fly our kite. We never climb up the easy way but go through the trees.
